motions.title: Extension of Public Comments Time
motions.description: Motion to extend public comments time for both sides by 4 minutes during SLUP 22-03 public hearing.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of February 27, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes (Heneghan did not vote - not present at meeting) • Approval of March 6, 2023, City Council Special Called Meeting Minutes (Heneghan did not vote - not present at meeting) • Resolution for Budget Amendment for Fiscal Year 2022 • Additional Funding Authorization for 2419 Redcliff Way Storm Repairs • Additional Funding Authorization for 5583 Glenrich Drive Storm Repairs

motions.title: Resolution Appointing Mike Herman to Dunwoody Development Authority
motions.description: Approval of resolution appointing Mike Herman as member of Dunwoody Development Authority (moved from consent agenda at Seconder's request).

motions.title: Update to DeKalb County Multi-Jurisdictional Mitigation Plan
motions.description: Approval of DeKalb County Multi-Jurisdictional Mitigation Plan (moved to discussion on March 27th agenda per Mayor's request).

motions.title: Contract with CGS, LLC for Landscaping on Winters Chapel Path Phase 1
motions.description: Approval of contract with CGS, LLC for landscaping on Winters Chapel Path Phase I in amount of $129,306.28 plus 10% contingency for total of $142,350.00.

motions.title: Contract Amendment to Municipal Services Contract for Planning & Zoning Services
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment to municipal services contract for planning and zoning services.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for legal and real estate discussions.

publicHearings.title: SLUP 22-03: Personal Care Home at 1822 Mount Vernon Road (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of Special Land Use Permit to allow 7-resident personal care home at 1822 Mount Vernon Road. Applicant withdrew variance request. Proposed lot coverage 43.3%, revised site plan includes stormwater mitigation. Extensive public comments both in favor and opposition. Staff recommends approval with conditions.
publicHearings.applicant: Anna and Roman Khoklan, represented by Attorney Anre Washington

presentations.title: City Manager's Report
presentations.description: Monthly report from City Manager Eric Linton.

discussionItems.title: Contract with DeKalb Community Service Board for Licensed Behavioral Health Clinician
discussionItems.description: Presentation of contract with DeKalb Community Service Board to provide licensed behavioral health clinician to Dunwoody Police Department in partnership with Doraville Police Department. City of Dunwoody cost $81,020.12, Doraville $16,653.00.

specialEvents.title: Scout Recognition
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch recognized Scout Declan Heneghan of Troop 477 working on Communications Badge and Eagle Scout certification.

notes: National Kidney Month proclamation moved to March 27 meeting due to honoree unavailability
Extensive public hearing on SLUP 22-03 with significant community input
Council Member Heneghan abstained from voting on February 27 and March 6 minutes due to absence
